alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 17 at 3:39PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Palm Beach County through 415 PM EDT... At 339 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Village Of Golf, or near Boynton Beach, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Boca Raton, Boynton Beach, Delray Beach, Lake Worth, Palm Beach, Ocean Ridge, Greenacres, Palm Springs, Lantana, Atlantis, Village Of Golf, Kings Point, Dunes Road, Whisper Walk, Hamptons At Boca Raton, Loxahatchee NWR, Lake Clarke Shores, Hypoluxo and South Palm Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
